message.content: {"given_definition_quality":35,"better_definition":"measure word for pieces or chunks","sentence":"我要一块。","image_prompt":"A simple digital artwork with a soft apocalypse animation style showing a small child pointing at a single block (such as a piece of bread or a simple stone) on a table, the background faded and slightly surreal, emphasizing the singularity of the object.
